concept.title: Try Adding Some Pictures or Links to Videos
concept.shortdesc: This section is for you to add your multimedia assets to get a feel for how they work with ePublisher.

conbody.p: For now, we recommend just using the native functions of your authoring tool to add your media assets inline. You will see them appear in the output in the same manner. If you have a DITA authoring tool, then just use it to create links to images or videos.
When you have a full seat of ePublisher, you will be able to change some of the asset behaviors in the generated output, but for now, you can see how easy it is to add multimedia to your outputs.
